mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id id, a.office_id AS "officeId", a.login_name loginName, a.password, a.user_name name, a.email, a.phone_no phone, a.mobile_no mobile, a.user_type userType, a.login_ip loginIp, a.login_date loginDate, a.remarks, a.login_flag loginFlag FROM com_user a WHERE del_flag != 'Y' AND a.login_name = #{loginName}

SELECT a.user_id id, a.office_id AS "officeId", a.login_name loginName, a.password, a.user_name name, a.email, a.phone_no phone, a.mobile_no mobile, a.user_type userType, a.login_ip loginIp, a.login_date loginDate, a.remarks, a.login_flag loginFlag FROM com_user a WHERE del_flag != 'Y' AND a.user_id = #{id}

SELECT a.role_id id, a.role_name name, a.role_enname enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.remarks, a.del_flag, a.is_sys AS sysData FROM com_role a, com_role_user ur WHERE ur.role_id = a.role_id AND a.del_flag='N' AND ur.user_id= #{userId}
SELECT org_name FROM tb_usc_org WHERE org_id = #{officeId} AND rownum=1
